title: S2 Ep20: Targeting the ultra-poor
itunes:title: Targeting the ultra-poor
description: If poor people are caught in a poverty trap, a large one-time grant might be life changing. That's the thinking behind programs to target the ultra-poor. But is the impact of this "big push" genuinely permanent? Garima Sharma tells Tim Phillips about the impact of a program in India, 10 years on.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
